oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Departments, Boards, and Agencies Subcommittee Meeting Minutes, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Chairman of the Departments, Boards and Agencies Subcommittee, Olive Abernathy, held regular subcommittee meetings between February and June of 1980. The subcommittee discussed the membership composition and organizational structure of metro departments under consolidation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Executive departments--Tennessee; Meetings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
